Articles.Content: The circular ridge of the crater slides down and buries your crater.

<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">I touch the ground. The atoms I have touched are mine. I keep doing this until the whole buried crater is mine, then activate vents on the outside that emit deadly neurotoxin, so whoever who comes near my crater breathes deadly neurotoxin and dies. \</font>

<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">My buried crater  guarded by neurotoxin.</font>
Neurotoxin becomes sapient, because it's neuro.
<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">I eat the hill using my Klamperture Science Eating Device (aka a giant mouth). My eaten hill.</font>
The Klamperture Science Eating Device is automatically switched to the "Vomit" mode.

<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">I engineer a Klamperture Science Eating Device that doesn't vomit, and eat the world.</font>

<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">My world.</font>

> 
> 
> 2 minutes ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> Klamperture Science Eating Device that doesn't vomit
> 

and dies from intoxication.

The world is free!  

FreeWorld!
I repeatedly touch the world. My world.

Your finger gets sticked to the world on touching.

The free world with attached you.
Yes. Therefore, my world.

It rolls. The sticked you can't escape...

World on its own

**Edited <time datetime="2019-04-22T19:43:34Z" title="04/22/2019 07:43  PM" data-short="5 yr">April 22, 2019</time> by kerbiloid**
I <font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">give up. FreeWorld.</font>

>free world

>Done. The world is successfully unallocated.

i temporarily transform into a giant python and eat the world. my eaten world

pythons can't throw up and this one can't get sick and can't die

> 
> 
> 3 minutes ago, The Minmus Derp said:
> 
> 
> i **temporarily** transform
> 

I wait for you to become Minmus again and mine you. My Minmus.

It's 0.14 and don't hope for Minmus. There's only Mun back then.

My Mun.
T-Series took over KSP Development, now it's full of Indian Songs...Not my KSP...
Nope. I leave KSP too because the music used to be good.

Squad took over KSP, and TakeTwo lost contract of being publisher of KSP.

Really pure KSP. I went back to it.

I team up with [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/) and add a ridiculous amount of defense emplacements to Minmus . Our heavily defended moon with lots of resources

Nuke warms. Minmus melts.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-04-24T11:40:22Z" title="04/24/2019 11:40  AM" data-short="5 yr">April 24, 2019</time> by kerbiloid**
I refreeze it. My heavily armed and resource rich minmus
The heavy arms stick frozen inside the solid Minmus.
the big gunz are in ORBIT so there. My solid minmus
The big gunz are big. So, their gravity attracts Minmus, and they collide.
